ClearScreen(Boolean)

Clears the lcd of all currently displayed characters.

Declaration
public void ClearScreen(bool resetCursor = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Boolean resetCursor

If set to false doesn't reset the cursor position to the first line, first character.

InitComponentAsync(Int32)

Initiates the component, making it ready for use.

Declaration
public Task<bool> InitComponentAsync(int pin = 0)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 pin

The data pin the component uses. If the component uses the I2C bus, the pin parameter is not required.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Boolean>

Returns True if initiation was successful.
| Improve this Doc View Source

SetCursorPosition(Int32, Int32)

Sets the position of the writing cursor on the lcd display. The cursor position isn't changed if an invalid parameter is passed.

Declaration
public void SetCursorPosition(int line, int column = 1)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 line

The line number. 1 for the first line, 2 for the second line.
System.Int32 column

The column number. Between 1 and 16. Default is 1.
| Improve this Doc View Source
